customer_query: I booked my flight na from Cebu to Narita but I need to change my travel date, pwede ba mag-rebook? How much will it cost?
resolution: You can rebook your flight but you'll need to pay a rebooking fee of PHP 2,000. According to our website, the rebooking fee is PHP 2,000 for domestic flights. Please note that rebooking is only allowed until 4 hours before your flight's scheduled departure time. To rebook, please call our customer service hotline at 02-851-8888 and follow the prompts to speak to a representative. You can also visit our website to chat with our customer support team. Please confirm your new travel dates and provide your booking reference number for further assistance.

customer_query: I just found out that I need to submit the Thailand Digital Arrival Card (TDAC) before my flight, but I'm not sure how this will impact my travel plans. Can you help me understand the requirements and what to expect?
resolution: To clarify, the TDAC is a mandatory requirement for all foreign guests entering Thailand starting May 1, 2025. You'll need to submit the TDAC online or by scanning the QR code with your personal and passport information, flight and accommodation details, and a health declaration. It's free and should only take a few minutes to complete. Please note that you'll need to carry a digital or printed copy of your TDAC confirmation for reference upon arrival. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. We're here to help.
source_article: Thailand Introduces Digital Arrival Card for Foreigners

customer_query: I BOOKED MY FLIGHT THROUGH AGODA AND NOW I CANT ADD IT TO MY ACCOUNT HELP!!!
resolution: We can help you resolve this issue. To add your booking to your account, please contact Agoda directly to obtain your booking reference number. If Agoda is unable to provide your booking reference number, please contact our customer support via our website or mobile app to connect with a live agent. They will assist you in adding your booking to your account. Note that if you are unable to contact Agoda, it may take up to 2 working days to resolve this issue. Please have your booking details ready when you contact us.
source_article: Adding or Linking a Booking to Your Account

customer_query: I'm having trouble understanding the infant baggage allowance. Can you please clarify?
resolution:
An infant without a seat is not allowed to check any bags, while an infant with a seat has a hand-carry baggage allowance and can purchase up to three pieces of checked baggage.
* For infants on lap, there is no baggage allowance.
* For infants with seats, they have a hand-carry baggage allowance and can purchase checked baggage up to PHP 200.
* If you'd like to clarify further or ask about our baggage policy, please contact our customer service at +63 2 70 20 555 or help@cebupacificair.com.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight kung may akong service dog?
resolution: Kumusta, salamat sa iyong tanong! Yes, you can rebook your flight if you need to bring a service dog on board. Our article on Service and Emotional Support Animals has the guidelines for service animals. When rebooking, please ensure that your service dog is trained to perform specific tasks for you, and provide all necessary documents and vaccination records. We'd be happy to assist you with the rebooking process. Please visit our Manage Booking section to explore your options.

customer_query: Dear Sir/Madam, I would like to inquire about the baggage allowance for my upcoming flight from Davao to Manila.
resolution: You can check the baggage allowance for your specific flight by referring to the link provided in the article, 'Learn more here:CEB Baggage Guidelines and Upgrade Options'. customer_query: I think the rebooking fee of PHP 200 for domestic flights is excessive and unfair. Can you please explain why this fee is charged?
resolution:
I understand your concern about the rebooking fee. Our rebooking fee is charged to cover the costs associated with processing changes to your booking, such as updating schedules and reassigning seats.

I understand that this may seem excessive, but I assure you that we have carefully considered our costs and fees to ensure that we can continue to provide you with the best possible service. customer_query: why do i have to pay extra for a rebooking fee when my emotional support dog is with me?
resolution: According to the article, all pets are considered as cargo and are subject to a rebooking fee. However, we allow dogs as service or emotional support animals, but they are still subject to the same policies as other pets. If you have any concerns about the rebooking fee, please contact our customer service through this number 02-8532-8000 or through our website for more information.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: I NEED HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND I WANT TO CHANGE MY LAST NAME BUT I DON'T KNOW HOW!!!
resolution: You can update your name by going to Manage Booking within 24 hours of booking. Since your flight is tomorrow, you can still make this change. Please make sure to replace any special characters in your name with regular letters. For example, ñ, é, and ü should be replaced with n, e, and u respectively. After making the change, your new name will be displayed on your boarding pass. Resolution time: 5 minutes.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: Kumusta kung gusto natin mag-extend ng stay sa brunei?
resolution: If you'd like to extend your stay in Brunei, please note that you'll need to contact our customer service directly to make the necessary arrangements. You may contact us at [customer.service@cebupacificair.com](mailto:customer.service@cebupacificair.com) or call +63 2 976 1834. Please have your booking reference and travel documents ready when you contact us. We'll do our best to assist you with your trip extension. Please note that you may incur additional fees for any changes to your booking. We appreciate your understanding.

customer_query: I think the change fee of PHP 2,000 is quite steep. Can you explain the policy?
resolution: I understand your concern. However, our change fee is outlined in our airline policies. If you'd like to change your flight, you'll need to pay the difference in fare, plus our change fee of PHP 2,000. This fee is non-refundable. If you're not happy with this policy, I suggest reaching out to our customer service team to discuss further. They may be able to provide additional context or assistance.

customer_query: i'm so confused... how do i get my boarding pass thru the app?
resolution: To get your boarding pass through our app, follow these steps: 1) Download and install our Cebu Pacific app from the App Store or Google Play. 2) Log in to your account using your booking reference number or your email address. 3) Go to the 'Check-in' section and follow the prompts to check in for your flight. 4) Once checked in, you can download your digital boarding pass. If you have trouble with this process, please contact our customer support team.

customer_query: I'M FLYING TOMORROW AND I DON'T HAVE A VALID ID!!! WHAT ID CAN I USE?!?!
resolution: You can refer to our Cebu Pacific Domestic Travel Guide to check the list of accepted IDs. According to the guide, a valid ID is required for domestic flights. Please view the list of accepted IDs here: <https://cebupacificair.com/domestic/travel-guide>. We recommend that you arrive at the airport with a valid ID to avoid any issues. If you are unable to find a valid ID, you may call our customer service hotline at 02-7020-888 or visit our website chat support to inquire about alternatives. Please note that airport counters for domestic flights close 45 minutes before departure.

customer_query: Kailangan ko maghanap ng opsyon para sa pagbabago ng lengguwahe sa website ng Cebu Pacific. Magkano ang bayad?
resolution:
There is no fee for changing the language on the Cebu Pacific website. Here's how you can do it:

1. Head to the Cebu Pacific website and click on the language selector located at the top right of the page.
2. Select your preferred language from the list.
3. If the language still hasn't changed, click on the country selector at the bottom of the website and select your preferred country from the list.

Please note that if you're accessing the website from a different country, some features may not be available. You can also try refreshing the website or using a different browser if the problem persists.

customer_query: I believe the fee for service animals is unreasonable. Can you explain the basis for the fee?
resolution: We understand your concern and appreciate your feedback. The fee for bringing a service animal on board is based on our operational costs and the need to ensure the well-being of all passengers. According to our article on Service and Emotional Support Animals, passengers bringing service animals are required to declare them during booking or via Manage Booking. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team. We're here to help.
source_article: Traveling with Service and Emotional Support Animals

customer_query: What's the baggage allowance for my flight?
resolution: For Cebu Pacific flights, the free baggage allowance is 7 kg for Economy class and 10 kg for SkyPass (Premium Economy) and Business class. Excess baggage fees start at P200 per kg. Please check your booking details or contact our customer service team for more information. You can also visit our website to learn more about our baggage policy.

customer_query: I'm trying to cancel my flight, but it's not converting to a Travel Fund as expected. Can you help me troubleshoot the issue?
resolution: Sorry to hear that you're experiencing issues with converting your flight to a Travel Fund. Please check that you've met the eligibility criteria, which includes cancelling your flight up to 2 hours before departure and having purchased CEB Flexi. If you've already done this and the issue persists, please try signing out and signing back in to your MyCebuPacific account or checking our how-to guides for troubleshooting steps. If you continue to encounter issues, please contact our customer support team and we'll assist you further.

customer_query: I'm having trouble understanding how the flight cancellation coverage works in CEB TravelSure. Can you explain it in more detail?
resolution: For flights in Thailand and Vietnam, the CEB TravelSure insurance package includes flight cancellation coverage up to the flight cost. This means that if you need to cancel your flight due to unforeseen circumstances, you'll be reimbursed up to the full value of your ticket. Please refer to our CEB TravelSure policies for more information. If you have any further questions, please contact our customer service team at +632 7020 888 or [support@cebupacificair.com](mailto:support@cebupacificair.com). Next step: Have you reviewed the full terms and conditions of the flight cancellation coverage?

customer_query: ano ba ang mga requirements para sa eTravel details para sa international flights?
resolution: Thank you for reaching out. To answer your question, when filling your eTravel details for international flights, please make sure to declare the amount of foreign currency you're carrying. If you're carrying more than PHP 50,000 or USD 10,000, you'll need to provide authorization from the Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas. You can check our article on the Cebu Pacific International Travel Guide for more information. Next steps: Please check our guide for the specific requirements and procedures for declaring foreign currency and contact us if you have any further questions.
category: Bangkok (Don Mueang) Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I am writing to inquire about the fee for checking in a large mobility aid. I am planning to travel with my wheelchair tomorrow.
resolution:

source_article: Can I Bring This in My Checked Baggage?

customer_query: I am connecting through Australia and I have a visa for that country, but I'm not sure if it's enough. Can you please clarify the requirements?
resolution: Para sa connecting flights sa Australia, ang visa ay kinakailangan sa lahat ng mga pasahero. Ang visa ay kailangan para sa lahat ng mga destinasyon sa Australia, gaya ng DVO–MNL–SYD. Kung wala kang visa, puwedeng mag-ingat ng board sa paliparan. Pwede kang makipag-ugnay sa ating customer support para sa tulong.

customer_query: I would like to know more about the excess baggage fee. Can you provide an example?
resolution: According to our airport baggage guidelines, if you buy a 20kg baggage allowance but check in a 23kg bag, you will pay for the excess 3kg. The excess baggage fee is PHP 50 per kilo. To avoid this fee, please keep your bags within the size and weight limits. If you need more information on our baggage allowance options, please let me know. Can I provide you with more details on our baggage policies?

customer_query: Hi there, I'm having some trouble getting my invoice. I booked a Cebu Pacific flight with my friend and I'd like to know if we can get separate invoices for each of us.

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FRIEND LEFT HER SURFBOARD TUCKED AWAY IN HER SUITCASE BUT NOW SHE REMEMBERS WE NEED TO CHECK IT IN. CAN SHE DO THAT AT THE AIRPORT TOMORROW?
resolution: To add CEB Special Baggage, your friend can manage their booking via the Cebu Pacific app or a MyCebuPacific account within 2 hours of their flight. Please note that each guest is only allowed one special baggage per kind, with a weight limit of 20kg. Excess weight up to 32kg can be purchased separately. To confirm, please check the baggage guidelines and upgrade options article for further instructions. Next step: check the baggage guidelines and upgrade options article.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook sa airport kung hindi pwedeng mag-akbay ng malayo?
resolution: Maaari kang mag-rebook para sa iyong pangalan sa airport, pero may ilang batas at mga pagbabayad na kailangan mong sundin. Ayon sa ating Iloilo Airport at Travel Guide, ang mga opsyonal na pagbabayad ay kinakailangan para sa mga pagbabago sa mga detalye ng iyong booking. Ang mga pagbabayad ay naka-iskedyul sa ating websayt at ibinibigay din sa ating Iloilo Airport travel guide. Kung ikaw ay may mga tanong, maaari kang tumawag sa aming hotline para sa tulong.

customer_query: Kumusta mag-rebook sa Cebu Pacific? Pwede bang mag-rebook sa Expedia booking?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your Expedia booking through Cebu Pacific. However, you'll need to pay a rebooking fee of PHP 1,200. resolution: Manage Booking is a feature on our website and app that allows you to view and modify your existing bookings. customer_query: paano ko makakakuha ng bag ko kung paparating ako muna sa cebu? pwede ba kong mag-rebook?
resolution: You can still collect your baggage at the Manila Ninoy Aquino International Airport (MNL) before flying to Cebu. Please proceed to the baggage claim area and wait for your baggage to arrive. If you'd like to rebook your flight, please contact our 24/7 contact center at +632 855-8888. We will require you to pay for the rebooking fee, which is PHP 500. Please note that rebooking fees are non-refundable.

customer_query: I am a first-time flyer and I am confused about the seat selection process. Can you explain it to me?
resolution: When you book a flight, you can choose your seat. There are three seat classes available: Premium, Standard Plus, and Standard. Premium seats offer extra legroom and priority boarding, while Standard seats are just a seat of your choice. If you didn't buy Seat Selector, you will be assigned a random seat at check-in. I recommend booking your seat in advance to ensure that you sit together with your fellow passengers. If you're traveling with children, it's even more important to book your seats in advance. Next step: review the seat selection options for your flight and book your seat.

customer_query: Kumusta po ang proseso ng online check-in for our flight to Hong Kong?
resolution: Glad you asked! According to our travel guide, Hong Kong International Airport has flight information display screens (FIDS) located throughout the airport that provide updates on flight status, boarding gates, and other important information. To check-in online, please log in to your Cebu Pacific account and follow the prompts. You will need to provide your booking reference number and travel documents. Please note that online check-in is available from 24 hours to 1 hour prior to your scheduled departure time. If you're unsure about the process or have any issues, our customer support team is here to help. You can reach us via phone at +63 02 7020 888 or email at support@cebupacificair.com. May I assist you with logging in to your account?
source_article: Hong Kong Airport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'm planning to travel to Singapore and I have a reduced mobility. I'd like to know more about the wheelchair assistance at the airport. Is it free?
resolution: Yes, wheelchair assistance at the Singapore Changi Airport is free! You can declare your wheelchair request at least 4 hours before your flight departure. Our staff will make sure your wheelchair is stored in the aircraft for proper safekeeping and ready for you when you deplane. However, please note that this service is only available upon arrival at our Singapore destination. No extra fee is required for this service.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: CAN I ADD CEB FLEXI AFTER I'VE FINISHED BOOKING MY FLIGHT??? IT SAYS I CAN'T!!!
resolution: According to our policy, CEB Flexi can only be added during the booking process. Unfortunately, this means you cannot add it after you've finished booking your flight. If you're looking to cancel your flight and convert its value to a Travel Fund, you can do so up to 2 hours before departure, but you'll need to cancel your booking first. We encourage you to check our how-to guides for step-by-step instructions.

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay an excess baggage fee for my surfboard even though it's within the weight limit. Can you please review your policy?

customer_query: I think it's unfair that I have to pay a separate fee to bring my firearm on my flight. Isn't this a service that you should provide for free?
resolution:

customer_query: I believe the fee for rebooking my flight is unfair. Can you explain the policy behind this fee?
resolution: The fee for rebooking your flight is part of our airline's policies to manage change fees. customer_query: i just arrived at the airport and im trying to find the currency exchange kiosk. how can i convert my peso to chinese yuan at shanghai airport?

customer_query: HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW AND IT'S DELAYED!!! WHAT DO I DO!!!
resolution: Rebooking for disrupted flights is available via the Self-Service Disruption Portal (SSDP) or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app or website. You can rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. If you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, please chat with us via our app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help. Additionally, affected passengers will be notified by Cebu Pacific frontline team, email, and/or text message. You can also check the real-time status of your flight through our Flight Status page. To proceed, please access the SSDP link provided to you, and follow the on-screen instructions.
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I received a Flight Swap offer, but I'm not sure if I'm eligible. Can you please tell me how Cebu Pacific identifies which flights qualify for the offer?
resolution: Cebu Pacific uses an automated system to identify which flights qualify for the Flight Swap offer. According to the policy, offers are sent directly by Cebu Pacific to selected passengers on such qualified flights. Please note that availability may vary depending on timing, travel dates, and other operational factors. You don't need to apply for the offer; if your booking is eligible, Cebu Pacific will notify you directly. Resolution time: 10 minutes.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko tapos magkano ang bayad?
resolution: Yes, you can still rebook your flight up to 2 hours before departure. Fare differences and change fees will apply. We recommend checking our [Manage Booking page](https://www.cebupacificair.com/manage-booking) to see the updated fare and fees. Once you've rebooked, you'll be charged the difference in fare, plus our change fee of PHP 2,000. Please note that you cannot change the destinations or sequence of your flight.

customer_query: paano ba mag online check in pag pumunta ko sa CRK?
resolution: To check-in online, follow these steps: 1. Log-in to your account on our website or mobile app. 2. Click on 'Check-in' and enter your booking reference and passenger information. 3. Pay for any additional baggage or services if required. 4. Print or download your boarding pass. Please note that online check-in is available for flights departing from Clark International Airport (CRK) starting October 26, 2025.
source_article: Transfer of San Jose Flights from Manila to Clark

customer_query: HELP!!! I'M FLYING TO KUALA LUMPUR TOMORROW AND I DON'T SEE MY FLIGHT ON THE FIDS!!!
resolution: Our apologies for the inconvenience! Please check the FIDS located throughout the airport for updates on flight status. If you're unable to find your flight information, you can also ask one of our airport representatives for assistance. They will be able to provide you with the latest information on your flight. If you have any further concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer service team via email at [support@cebupacific.com](mailto:support@cebupacific.com) or via phone at (+63) 02 70 70 700.
source_article: Kuala Lumpur Aiport and Travel Guide

customer_query: I'M FLYING TO HONG KONG TOMORROW!!! CAN I STILL CHANGE MY FLIGHT DETAILS!!!
resolution: Unfortunately, you cannot make any changes to your flight details within 24 hours of your scheduled departure time. According to our travel guide, passengers are encouraged to rely on the flight information display screens (FIDS) located throughout the airport for updates on flight status, boarding gates, and other important information. However, if you need to make changes to your flight, we recommend contacting our customer support team as soon as possible to explore options. customer_query: I'd like to know the procedures for boarding at NAIA Terminal 3.

If you have checked bags, you can use our Self Bag Drop Kiosks at Aisle A. For further assistance, please contact our customer service team.

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ang paglalakbay ko para sa emotional support dog ko?
resolution: Yes, you can rebook your flight to include your emotional support dog. Please make sure to declare this at the time of rebooking through Manage Booking. customer_query: ano ang pwedeng kainin sa airport? di ko alam kung saan makakakain sa terminal 4
resolution:

customer_query: I just booked a flight from Manila to Surigao and I'm wondering if I can change my flight to a different date. I'd like to know what the fees are.
resolution: You can change your flight to a different date, but please note that there will be rebooking fees. The fees are PHP 500 for domestic flights. customer_query: what's the difference between PWD/PRM and senior citizen? pwede ba mag-rebook if i'm late?
resolution: PWD/PRM stands for Persons with Disabilities and Persons with Reduced Mobility, respectively. Senior citizens, on the other hand, are eligible for assistance due to their age. According to your booking policy, you can rebook your flight if you notify us at least 2 hours before your original flight time. However, please note that rebooking fees may apply, which start at PHP 1,500 (plus any applicable fare difference).
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: pwede ba mag-rebook ang flight para sa pagpapalibre ng anak ko?
resolution: According to our travel guide, children under the age of 2 can travel for free if they sit on an adult's lap. However, if your child requires their own seat, you will need to book a separate ticket. You can contact our customer service team at +632 8702 0888 to discuss your options and any potential fees associated with rebooking.

customer_query: I believe it's unfair to charge a separate fee for bringing firearms on board. Is there any way we can talk about this policy further?
resolution: We appreciate your feedback on our policies. However, the Firearms Handling Fee is a regulatory requirement mandated by the Philippine government. This fee is used to cover the costs associated with handling firearms and ammunitions on our flights. We understand your concerns, but we are not in a position to waive or refund this fee. We can, however, provide more information on the requirements for bringing firearms on board. Please see our policies and guides for more details. Next step: If you have any further questions or concerns, please feel free to ask us.

customer_query: kumusta po ako magchange ng contact number ng aking booking? pwede ko ba kaya gawin yan?
resolution: Yes, you can update your contact number. According to our policy, you can change it multiple times as necessary. Please go to Manage Booking and follow these steps: 1. Log in to your account, 2. Select your booking, 3. Go to the contact information section and update your phone number. Note that you can only do this up to 2 hours before your flight. You can ask for assistance at the airport counters if you need help.
source_article: Updating Your Guest or Contact Details

customer_query: I have a senior citizen with me, how do I request assistance during boarding?
resolution: To request special assistance for a Senior Citizen, please declare it ahead of time. You can do this when booking the flight or through Manage Booking on the Cebu Pacific app at least two hours before departure. When you arrive at the airport, inform our staff about your request and we'll direct you to our dedicated lane for PWDs/PRMs and Senior Citizens. This way, we can make sure they receive the assistance they need during boarding.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: How do I secure my bookings with multi-factor authentication? I'm concerned about the safety of my information.
resolution: To secure your bookings with multi-factor authentication, simply log in to your MyCebuPacific account and go to the 'Account Settings' section. From there, you can enable multi-factor authentication for your account. This will add an extra layer of security to your account, protecting your personal and financial information. Our website and systems are regularly updated to meet the latest security standards and regulatory requirements. If you have any further questions or concerns, please contact us. We're committed to keeping your information safe. Next step: enable multi-factor authentication for your account.
source_article: Signing up for a MyCebuPacific Account

customer_query: I NEED HELP!!! MY FLIGHT IS TOMORROW HELP!!!
resolution: For urgent cases like yours, please call our 24/7 hotline at +63 998 624 5250. You can also chat with us via the Cebu Pacific app or website to connect with a Live Agent who can help you rebook your flight for free up to 30 days before or 30 days after your original schedule. If you need to rebook beyond the 30-day period, the fee is PHP 450. Please have your booking reference number ready to avoid any delays. Can I assist you with your rebooking request?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: I'd like to request a refund for the wheelchair assistance fee, as I didn't use the service due to unforeseen circumstances. Is it possible to get a refund or a credit for future bookings?
resolution: We understand your situation, and we're happy to assist you. However, our wheelchair assistance fee is non-refundable and non-creditable. However, we can provide a partial refund for the fee, minus a service charge. Please contact our Customer Service team via email at customercare@cebupacificair.com or through our 24/7 hotline at +63 2 7744 8333 to discuss further. Please note that refunds are subject to our refund policy.
source_article: Requesting for Medical, Mobility, and Travel Assistance

customer_query: I am a first-time flyer, and I am not sure how to get to my flight status. Can you please help me with that?
resolution: You can check the real-time status of your flight through our Flight Status page. To access it, please go to the Cebu Pacific website and click on the Flight Status tab. You can also check your flight status through the Cebu Pacific app. If you need further assistance, please let us know and we can guide you through the process. Have you tried checking your flight status yet?
source_article: How to Manage Your Disrupted Flight

customer_query: Pwede ba mag-rebook ng flight ko sa ibang araw pag may bagong policy or promo?
resolution: Hindi ito posible mag-rebook ng flight sa ibang araw bilang isang bagong policy o promo kung hindi ka nagbayad ng Admin Fee. Ang Admin Fee ay ibinawas sa iyong orihinal na bilhin nang flight kung ikaw ay mag-rebook sa loob ng mga 24 oras. Kung ikaw ay naghahanap ng bagong flight sa ibang araw, kailangan mong magbayad ng Admin Fee. Maaari kang tumawag sa airport counter para sa mga detalyadong mga pautangin. Next step: Maaari kang magtanong sa aming support team para sa mga detalyadong mga pautangin.
source_article: Service Fees and Philippine Travel Tax

customer_query: Thank you for explaining the Flight Swap offer. However, I am still unsure about the authenticity of the email I received. Could you please confirm if the email is indeed from Cebu Pacific?
resolution: You're welcome! To confirm if the Flight Swap offer is genuine, please make sure the email you received is from no-reply@swap.cebupacificair.com. You can also try to verify through our official channels or chat with us to connect with a Live Agent who can help confirm your Flight Swap offer. Additionally, please note that Cebu Pacific uses an automated system to identify which flights qualify for the Flight Swap offer, and offers are sent directly by Cebu Pacific. Resolution time: 8 minutes.

customer_query: I was informed that Cebu Pacific flights between Manila and Chiang Mai will be suspended effective March 1, 2026. I paid a premium for the flexibility to change my flight dates without penalty. Don't I deserve a refund for the rebooking fee?
resolution: We understand your concern and apologize for any inconvenience caused. However, our flight schedule changes are subject to various factors, including government regulations and airline decisions. In this case, the rebooking fee is a standard policy fee to ensure that our team can accommodate your schedule changes. We will be happy to assist you with rebooking your flight once flights resume, without any additional fee. Please note that you will still be subject to our regular rebooking policy. If you have any further concerns, please contact our Customer Support Team at +63 02 8588 8500, available between 8am to 9pm daily.
source_article: Chiang Mai Airport and Travel Guide
